comments: In Taxon, 48(4): 786 (1999) year of birth is given as 1911 contrary to Index Herb. ed. 8 which gives 1916.
examples: Halophila madagascariensis M.S. Doty & B.D. Stone in Taxon, 16: 417 (1967).
source: Berkeley Algal List. CMI. Index Herb., ed. 8: 394 (1990). Year of death from Taxon, 48(4): 786 (1999).
